website_summaries.verdict: Though they aren't meant for extremely cold temperatures or playing in the snow, these touchscreen gloves are a great choice for young techies.
pros: Kids who want to keep their hands warm in moderately cold temperatures while texting will love these touchscreen gloves for their cool looks and flexible wear
3 sizes with small fitting kids as young as 4
cons: Not waterproof, and not suited for wearing in very cold temperatures
Falls somewhat on the higher end of the price range for kids' gloves

website_summaries.verdict: While they aren't the best gloves for winter play, kids that don't want to give up their tech while outdoors will appreciate the touchscreen fingers.
pros: Flexible gloves made of nylon, polyester, and spandex
Kids rave about being able to use their phones and tablets while wearing them
cons: Some discrepancy in sizing - may run too small or too large
Not enough warmth for long-term exposure to cold or for playing in snow

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! I now have two pair. The smallest size I bought for my daughter that just turned 3 and they are still pretty big on her. These gloves stretch, and are thin, but 100 times better than a stretchy glove because of the fabric they are made out of is warmer and they don't get wet as quickly in snow. It is impossible for my 3 and 4 year olds to wear regular gloves, their fingers are too small. These are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: MS JULIE BROWN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality (especially for the price)
customer_reviews.text: Great quality (especially for the price)! We were looking for some gal/winter, pre-snow gloves for our 5 yo. And these look like they'll be perfect! Flexible and light/not bulky, yet well insulated. I'll update once she's worn them a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Kameron Schoen

customer_reviews.title: work well for chilly days
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect for chilly days around town, or walking from the car to the ski hill with gear. They are comfy, easy to get on and off and have some grip for holding a shovel or broom when our daughter is helping us with yard work. We have ordered the next size up for when she outgrows these!
customer_reviews.author: finnchick

customer_reviews.title: Great in moderate cold to
customer_reviews.text: Have gotten two pairs of these this year for my daughter. Great in moderate cold to 32F
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: working like a charm to keep my daughters hands warm and ...
customer_reviews.text: working like a charm to keep my daughters hands warm and dry, we bought the same set as mittens for our youngest daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Theodore J. Doscher

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his ice skating class. It fits his little 3-1/2 years old hands. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: lamay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little kid gloves...fit as expected and they actually work when they try using devices.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Walton

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 5yr old daughter's hand like a glove(no pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5yr old daughter's hand like a glove(no pun intended). Hopefully it'll last a year or so. Can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: These gloves are great!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit my 8 year old daughter perfectly. She loves them. She is able to play her ipod while wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Size was way off. Bought a medium for my 11 year old son - Much too small so i ended up returning them
customer_reviews.author: rabz786

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter was heart-broken when she lost her first pair-we ...
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter was heart-broken when she lost her first pair-we just had to replace them! She loves the feel and how they keep her hands warm.

customer_reviews.title: they love it. They even try wearing it to bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for both of my kids, they love it. They even try wearing it to bed....

customer_reviews.title: When it's too cold to remove your gloves
customer_reviews.text: My grandson love these so they can use their ipads while waiting for their turn to horseback ride.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 5 year old! Fits his had perfect too!!

customer_reviews.text: Bought two pair - for two of my grandsons - and they love them. Very comfortable and easy to put on and take off.

customer_reviews.title: Check your item label size vs. actual item tag size.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gloves size medium for my 8 year old. Packed arrived and labeled (looks like original package had a sticker replaced) as medium, item tag listed as small and fit as small.
customer_reviews.author: Canadian Consumer.

customer_reviews.title: He says they are cool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair that I bought for my grandson. He loves them!! He says they are cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: My boys love these gloves. They fit perfect and keep their hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Abshire

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect glove for my toddler, sizing is a little big but it's not falling off on her so she'll grow into them. We love going on walks and these gloves are a must in the cold, winter season. I loved the functionality of the adult version of these gloves and can say the same thing on the children version.
customer_reviews.author: Fred R
